name: Grands!® Monkey Bread
author: Pillsbury
summary: This is it! The classic monkey bread recipe, oozing with warm caramel and cinnamon. Monkey bread is irresistible!
ingredients: 2 (16.3 ounce) cans Pillsbury® Grands!® Homestyle refrigerated buttermilk biscuits
¾ cup butter or margarine, melted
directions: Lightly grease 12-cup fluted tube pan with shortening or cooking spray
In large -storage plastic food bag, mix granulated sugar and cinnamon
Separate dough into 16 biscuits; cut each into quarters
Arrange in pan, adding walnuts and raisins among the biscuit pieces
In small bowl, mix brown sugar and butter; pour over biscuit pieces
Bake 28 to 32 minutes or until golden brown and no longer doughy in center
Turn upside down onto serving plate; pull apart to serve
